resources.string: Game created by: Michał Ziółek and Patryk Wyczesany.\n

List of graphics and their authors(graphics from opengameart.org):
 |Magic buttons| Author: Dakal, |UI Buttons| Author: PINKCANNON
 |Grass textures| Author: Para, |Castle texture| Author:Hyptosis, Zabin, Daniel Cook
 |Gold Knight texture| Author: Calciumtrice, |Weapon Slash Effect| Author: Cethiel 
 |Goblin texture| Author: William.Thompsonj Attribute Stephen "Redshrike" Challener 
 as graphic artist and William. Thompsonj as contributor.
 |Grue(Spectre) texture| Author: Jesse McCarthy, |Joystick| Author: CruzR
 |Pixel icons| Author: Henrique Lazarini (7Soul1), |GUI| Author: Under the moon
 
 Others:
 |Font type "Lato"| Author: Łukasz Dziedzic
 Logo from cooltext.com
 Background pattern from Toptal Subtle Patterns
